name: Shuuka social links
author: shuuka.com

sections.description:
We see a problem with the various nicknames we often can not use in the different networks the same. It is sometimes complicated to remember all the names of the networks. Our mission is to simplify this for the user and the follower. With Shuuka.com, you can list all networks, making it easy for you and your followers to list your nicknames whenever and wherever you want. For you as a user it is simple and practical. You list all your social media and have a statistics with the visits, clicks and shuks to your followers. We always work diligently to be up-to-date on networks and insist on a simple use for all.

Smart links.
With Shuuka smart links, users will be able to remember the link easily and intuitively.

Verify all your profiles.
With shuuka you can certify all your profiles so that all your users only follow your official accounts.

Grow Audience.
We help you to find you easily. With our ranking list, they will find your faster, which will lead you to win more followers.

Arbitrary section

We Use a API from shuuka.com to get Images and links. (We put only your profile link)

EXAMPLE OF THE EXTERNAL IMG LINK
https://www.shuuka.com/images/socialicons/shuuka-[network].png

API LINK IS:
https://api.shuuka.com/v1/user/data

We Use also the google analytic script and the facebook pixel script.
you can use it optional

Features

  • On bio Link
  • Add unlimited link to your profile
  • Search engine
  • Short URL
  • AMP URL
  • Smart Links
  • Link Traking
  • Report Fake accounts
  • See popular users
  • QR-Code
sections.installation:
INSTALLATION FROM WITHIN WORDPRESS

Visit Plugins > Add New.
Search for Shuuka social link.
Install and activate the Shuuka social links plugin.
Put your Secret Key from shuuka.com and write a slug on the shuuka social link setting page.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

Upload the entire shuuka-social-links folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
Visit Plugins.
Activate the Shuuka social links plugin.
Put your Secret Key from shuuka.com and write a slug on the shuuka social link setting page.
sections.faq:
For more information, visit https://www.shuuka.com

Where can i find my secret key?

You have to Log in and go to => Your profile, edit profile, settings Here

It’s Free?

Yes, it’s completely Free, you need only a Free Shuuka account.

How can I contribute to the plugin?

If you have some ideas to improve the plugin or to solve a bug, feel free to raise an issue or submit a pull request
sections.changelog: For the plugin’s changelog, please see Release.

short_description: Shuuka social link help you to display all your social link in one single page. Your own bio link for instagram and other social media.

screenshots.caption: When installing and activating the plugin a new tab is added to the wordpress menu
Click on settings. Then the first thing you have to do is enter the "secret key" that you will find on shuuka.com. The second would be to introduce the slug you want to use to call your landingpage
Enter in the browser your domain plus the slug you chose and you will see your active landingpage
